mapper.sql: order_id, order_no, pay_type, staff_id, mobile, order_money, order_status, pay_account, trade_id, trade_status, add_time
mapper.select:
select
from org_staff_pay_dept where 1=1
and mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=CHAR}
order by add_time desc

select
from org_staff_pay_dept
order by add_time desc
select sum(order_money) as totalOrderMoney from org_staff_pay_dept
mapper.insert: insert into org_staff_pay_dept (order_id, order_no, pay_type, staff_id, mobile, order_money, order_status, pay_account, trade_id, trade_status, add_time) values (#{orderId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payType,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{staffId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{mobile,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{orderMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{orderStatus,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{payAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tradeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tradeStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addTime,jdbcType=NUMERIC})

update org_staff_pay_dept
order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pay_type = #{payType,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
staff_id = #{staffId,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=CHAR},
order_money = #{orderMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

trade_status = #{tradeStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}

update org_staff_pay_dept set order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_type = #{payType,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, staff_id = #{staffId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=CHAR}, order_money = #{orderMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, order_status = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, pay_account = #{payAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, trade_id = #{tradeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, trade_status = #{tradeStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=NUMERIC} where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
